mapper.select: select a.*,c.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_forums WHERE forum_id = a.forum_id) as people, CASE WHEN b.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS forum_following_state from ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, d.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM forums where lower(forum_name) like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY forum_id DESC ) d WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * 5 ) a left outer join user_forums b ON a.forum_id = b.forum_id and b.user_id = #{user_id} LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_section c ON a.forum_id = c.forum_id WHERE RNUM > (#{page}-1) * 5

SELECT c.*, d.pro_path, d.nickname, e.*, f.*, CASE WHEN g.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS board_like_state, CASE WHEN h.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS board_save_state FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM board where lower(title) like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY board_id DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * 5 ) c LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS d ON c.user_id = d.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN img e ON c.board_id = e.board_id LEFT OUTER JOIN hashtag f ON c.board_id = f.board_id LEFT OUTER JOIN board_like g ON c.board_id = g.board_id and g.user_id = #{user_id} LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_SAVE h ON c.board_id = h.board_id and h.user_id = #{user_id} WHERE RNUM > (#{page}-1) * 5

SELECT c.*, d.pro_path, d.nickname, f.*, e.*, CASE WHEN g.like_ud IS NOT NULL THEN g.like_ud ELSE 0 END AS board_like_state, CASE WHEN h.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS board_save_state FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM
FROM ( SELECT i.* FROM board i LEFT OUTER JOIN hashtag u ON i.board_id = u.board_id where lower(i.content) like '%'||#{search}||'%' or lower(u.hashtag_name) like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY i.board_id DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * 5 ) c LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS d ON c.user_id = d.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN img e ON c.board_id = e.board_id LEFT OUTER JOIN hashtag f ON c.board_id = f.board_id LEFT OUTER JOIN board_like g ON c.board_id = g.board_id and g.user_id = #{user_id} LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_SAVE h ON c.board_id = h.board_id and h.user_id = #{user_id} WHERE RNUM > (#{page}-1) * 5
